description: Need to pick through your bike computer data on your last cycle ride, this is the app for you!
summary: Great application for diving through your training data

description: It looks very rich in features, but it's super slow and won't even render its own tabs and menus properly on Fedora 38 KDE. I have high-end hardware and I don't have any issues with other even highly graphic apps, but this one takes a minute to even click on a button. If this issue gets resolved it looks very interesting

Es, desde mi punto de vista, el mejor software para analizar datos de entrenamiento de bicicleta, a pie o natacion. Tambien puedes controlar los entrenamientos indoor y programar las sesiones para muchos rodillos.
